_sText:
After the great support of Harrisonbrtn and his ideas, I could finally finish this map.

It contains HDR, and is fully optimized.
It's not big in size, but with it's 100 ways and many objects to hide behind such as stairs and ladders that affect the gameplay it's not only a good-looking map, but also one with very much interesting gameplay sides.

The story:
Well when I came into my classroom, the previous teacher (art) has painted a overview of "a kind of a map" on the table. When I saw it I got inspirated and made a map out of it. Lol.

<s>Update 01/07/2009:
Added new BSP with visual updates, no redownload required.</s>
